post.text: "I know it sometimes seems a little odd for someone running for president to say we need more love and kindness in America. But I'm telling you from the bottom of my heart, we do."

comment.author: Morgan
comment.text: I guess Hillary didn't wipe her Weiner with a towel good enough, cause the FBI stroked her Weiner and the emails squirted out. #TRUMPFORPRESIDENT2016 #hillaryforprison2017

replies.author: Madison
replies.text: Morgan , your comments are like that of an immature 12 old boy trying to impress his friends.
